timeline.message:
DEV-1345 Upgrade GRIDSS to 2.9.3

Also switches to use the GRIDSS Java based repeat masker annotations.

Disables CHORD on hg38, not really related but we used this branch to
test a full hG38 run, our chord version doesn't support hg38.

DEV-1345 Upgrade GRIDSS to 2.9.3

Merge with the GRIPSS changes

DEV-1345 Upgrade GRIDSS to 2.9.3

Remove unused code and assembly argument to Sage.

DEV-1345 Upgrade GRIDSS to 2.9.3

Remove unused code and assembly argument to Sage.

DEV-1345 Upgrade GRIDSS to 2.9.3

Merge with Sage 2.2 changes.

timeline.bodyText: This looks a little odd? Should it be a fna file?
timeline.author: jonbaber

replies.bodyText:
This is the correct actually. Peter discovered a few months ago we'd been using the wrong ref genome. This is the "no_alt_analysis" set, the prior is the full set. Thought this impacted your GC profile as well?
FNA is fasta and means fasta nucleic acid.
replies.author: pauldwolfe

timeline.message:
DEV-1345 Upgrade GRIDSS to 2.9.3

Feedback from review:
- Use the GridssAnnotation and remore ViralAnnotation.java class to reduce duplication and use
correct viral genome version in main caller pipeline.
- Use the annotated, unfiltered VCF as the VCF for persistence
